alert.note: Alert for Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Johnson; Sevier Smoky Mountains; Southeast Carter; Southeast Greene; Southeast Monroe; Unicoi (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 13 at 2:30AM CST until January 14 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Snow accumulations will vary greatly depending on elevation. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 24 inches across the highest terrain and 2 to 6 inches over the foothills. * WHERE...Far east Tennessee Mountains, including the Smoky Mountain National Park. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heavy snow may bring down trees and power lines, causing power outages.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
